helpUsage: Find out information about how to donate.```/donate```
title: KyuBot Premium
description: If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing and creating content updates for the bot.
fieldValue:
- Customise rank card background
- Customise rank card color
- Customise rank card opacity
- Give/remove experience from members (requires admin)
- Lower cooldowns
- Sneakpeaks to new features
